Graham Bell - Two Stroke Performance Tuning.pdf 52062109 BibleDuMoteur2T.pdf 1750228 Le Gonflage des cyclomoteurs V2 - Didier Thomas.pdf 67629218 Motorcycle_Handling_And_Chassis_Design_Foale.

item.title: Ressources sur l'émulation
item.description: No-intro, ReDump… de qui parle t’on ? Liens de téléchargement de rom/iso ? RomCenter Sony Playstation EUR Redump (archive.org) Nintendo Gamecube EUR (archive.org) Emulateurs []()

item.title: Fabrication d'un bartop (borne d'arcade)
item.description: Introduction Amateur de jeux vidéos en général et de rétrogaming en particulier, également bricoleur dans mes temps libre, j’ai eu le declic pour commencer a imaginer ma borne d’arcade lorsque j’ai récupéré un ecran 7 pouces initialement déstiné à un usage pour un camping car. L’écran est evidemment obsolète, et n’ayant pas de camping car (de toute facon meme avec un camping car je ne l’aurais pas utilisé), je ne voyait aucune utilité a cet objet, et cela m’ennuyait de ne pas l’utiliser.

item.title: Ressources sur les Shoot'em Up
item.description: Qu’est qu’un bon shmups ? The Anatomy of a Shmup Designing a shoot em’ up - tips n’ tricks 101 Experience Design Assignment 2: Shoot-em-up Behind the Scenes: What makes a good SHMUP? (Breaking) The Shmup Dogma Designing smart, meaningful SHMUPs Informations supplémentaires What makes a good shmup? Selection des meilleurs titres par console TurboGrafx-16 Blazing Lazers (Nom original: Gunhead) Super Star Solider Megadrive (Genesis) Musha Aleste: Full Metal Fighter Ellinor

item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is the world’s fastest framework for building websites. It is written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Pico 8: Présentation et Ressources
item.description: PICO 8 RESSOURCES Officiel Site officiel Documentation Wiki929973 2D PLATEFORMER PHYSICS The guide to implementing 2D platformers Platformer controls: how to avoid limpness and rigidity feelings Mario gravity Plateformer physics 101 and the 3 fundamental equation of plateformer Physics in platformer games Super Mario Bros. 3 Physics a complete guide by Jdaster64 Envato - Basic 2D Platformer Physics Video Game Physics Tutorial - Part I: An Introduction to Rigid Body Dynamics Sonic Physics Guide A study of jumping in 2D platform games Jumping Thesis by Martin Fasterholdt Mechanics Automatically Recognized via Interactive Observation: Jumping RESSOURCES https://marcosecchi.

item.title: The "figure" Shortcode
item.description: Hugo has figure shortcode built in, so you can easily add figcaptions or hyperlink rel attributes to images. Documentations can be found here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#figure This theme has 3 CSS classes made for figure elements: big: images will break the width limit of main content area. left: images will float to the left. right: images will float to the right. If a figure has no class set, the image will behave just like a normal markdown image: !

item.title: Post With Featured Image
item.description: Just define the image URL in the content’s front matter, the featured image will be displayed as the background. For example: ---images:-https://picsum.photos/1024/768/?random--- This is an array, you can set multiple urls, only the first url will be used. These images is also used in Twitter Cards and the Open Graph metadata.
